scripts.count:questions: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const files=fs.readdirSync('quizzes').filter(f=>f.endsWith('.json')); let total=0; files.forEach(f=>{const quiz=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('quizzes/'+f)); const easy=(quiz.pools?.easy||[]).length; const hard=(quiz.pools?.hard||[]).length; const questions=(quiz.questions||[]).length; const count=easy+hard+questions; console.log(f.padEnd(35), count.toString().padStart(3)); total+=count;}); console.log('Total questions:'.padEnd(35), total.toString().padStart(3));"
